SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo

Class Config

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.Config
public class Config extends Object
Configuration class for the game "F-15: Strike Eagle." This class contains constants and methods for managing game settings, paths, and other values required for the game's functionality. It includes screen resolution, file paths, spawn probabilities, and other gameplay-specific attributes. This is a utility class and cannot be instantiated.

      Private constructor to prevent instantiation of the Config class.

  • Method Details

    • getScreenHeight

      public static int getScreenHeight()
      Retrieves the current screen height.
      Returns:
      the current screen height.

    • getScreenWidth

      public static int getScreenWidth()
      Retrieves the current screen width.
      Returns:
      the current screen width.

    • setResolution

      public static void setResolution(int width, int height)
      Updates the screen resolution and recalculates dependent values.
      Parameters:
      width - the new screen width.
      height - the new screen height.

    • isFirstRun

      public static boolean isFirstRun()
      Checks if it is the first run of the game.
      Returns:
      true if it is the first run, false otherwise.

    • setFirstRun

      public static void setFirstRun(boolean firstRun)
      Sets the first run flag for the game.
      Parameters:
      firstRun - true to indicate the first run, false otherwise.

    • calculateResolutionDependentValues

      public static void calculateResolutionDependentValues()
      Calculates resolution-dependent values based on screen width and height. This method is called when the resolution is updated to adjust gameplay attributes.
